content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 28, "index": 22}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a jungle_pressure_plate, I need to craft jungle_planks first. To do that, I need to move the jungle_wood at slot 34 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 28, "index": 22}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 28, "index": 22}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a jungle_pressure_plate, I need to move 1 jungle_planks at slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 28, "index": 22}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I need to move 1 jungle_planks at slot 11 to the right of the jungle_planks in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
